title: Warlords II Scenario Builder for DOS
material_description: Floppy disk videogame. Three 3 1/2 inch floppy disks, CD-ROM, CD jewel case, registration card, subscription card, catalogue and manual in cardboard box
brief_description: Warlords II: Scenario Builder allows for an improved amount of customization to the base Warlords II game. These include the ability to edit the map, add new items, write descriptive text, create new unit and city graphics using a pixel editor and even change specific unit characteristics. 24 new scenarios also come with the pack, including ones that draw from historic sources like Medieval England to more far-fetched situations, like an alien invasion.
